EmailTemplate.name: HC-Hyper Consumption Customer Approval Required
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Case.Subject} : {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Case Number: {!Case.CaseNumber}
Thank you for your request.
Below schedule provides the best option to support your request at this time.
<Insert proposed schedule details here>
To enter your request using this schedule, please reply to this email providing your approval and attaching an updated purchase order with above information.
Honeywell Customer Support http://www.MyAerospace.com
